pages.text: $(thing)Composite Material$() is the most important component for progressing through Create. It can be made by $(l:mechanics/anvils#welding)Welding$() any cobblestone and a $(thing)Wrought Iron Ingot$() to make 15 or a $(thing)Zinc Ingot$() for just 5.$(br2)Remember, Welding requires $(l:mechanics/flux)Flux$() to work.
